amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that the section requiring a $5,000 protest fee shall not infringe upon the protections afforded by the First Amendment to the Constitution to petition for the redress of grievances.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 112-540 to clarify that the section requiring a $5,000 protest fee shall not infringe upon the protections afforded by the First Amendment to the Constitution to petition for the redress of grievances.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 230 (Roll no. 398).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 230 (Roll no. 398).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Connolly (VA).
